--0-893309006-1054672447=:8402 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii I will be finishing my final editorial corrections to Chapter 5 of "Rendering With Radiance." If anyone has found minor typos or simple corrections to the text, I would greatly appreciate hearing from you before the book goes out to be re-published. Please put "RWR" in the subject line. Thanks in advance, -Chas ckehrlich@yahoo.com --0-893309006-1054672447=:8402 Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii
I will be finishing my final editorial corrections to Chapter 5 of "Rendering With Radiance."  If anyone has found minor typos or simple corrections to the text, I would greatly appreciate hearing from you before the book goes out to be re-published.  Please put "RWR" in the subject line.
 
Thanks in advance,
 
-Chas
ckehrlich@yahoo.com
